name: The Fastest Fist
developer: Beijing Skyline Interaction Technology Co., Ltd.
publisher: Beijing Skyline Interaction Technology Co., Ltd.
description: It's a VR boxing game, you can train your reaction and boxing technic in this game.
minimum_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows 7 Processor: i5 4590 Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: GTX960 DirectX: Version 10 Storage: 2 GB available space
recommended_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows 10 Processor: i7 6700K Memory: 16 GB RAM Graphics: GTX1070 DirectX: Version 12 Storage: 2 GB available space

reviews.review_text: Legit good boxing work out. Arms are aching like hell next day and I only did x6 rounds.   My friend got to round 9 and the sweat soaked the head set.. careful of that.

This game has an absolute bare minimum amount of content to be considered a game but I still can't help but enjoy it. It'd be great to be able to block or even spar but I have a feeling this isn't one of those games that ever gets updated.
